result.purpose: Responsible for managing decentralized applications (dApps) including configuration and service interfaces.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating configuration and service logic for dApps.

pkg/dapp/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration settings for decentralized applications.

pkg/dapp/d_app_svc.go.purpose: This file defines a service interface for managing quick access decentralized applications (dApps) and highlights.
